price: C’est Lui Allah, le Créateur, Celui qui donne un commencement à toute chose, le Formateur. A Lui les plus beaux noms. Tout ce qui est dans les cieux et la Terre Le glorifie. Et c’est Lui le Puissant, le Sage.
arabic: هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡخَٰلِقُ ٱلۡبَارِئُ ٱلۡمُصَوِّرُۖ لَهُ ٱلۡأَسۡمَآءُ ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰۚ يُسَبِّحُ لَهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: huwa al-lahu al-khāliqu al-bāri-u al-muṣawiru lahu al-asmāu al-ḥus'nā yusabbiḥu lahu mā fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
